text: ɓen woɗɗitotooɓe bakkatuuji mawɗi ɗin e pankare [ɓe faggitotaako] si wanaa tokoosi ɗin. Pellet, Joomi maa ko yaajuɗo yaafuyee. Ko Kanko ɓuri anndude on gila O fuɗɗunoo on ummaade e leydi, e nde wonunoɗon fuƴƴannde ka deedi neeniraaɓe mon. Wata on mantu ko'e mon; ko Kanko ɓuri anndude gomɗuɓe ɓen
